name: Broccoli Rice Casserole
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
can cream of mushroom soup (10 3/4 oz.)

instructions: Cook broccoli until tender. Drain. Saute onions and celery in butter. Add soups, broccoli, rice and cheese. Save some cheese to put on top. Pour into buttered casserole and sprinkle cheese on top. Bake at 350Â° for about 20 minutes. Use 2 quart casserole dish or a long baking dish.
